member.name: ID2D1Brush.GetOpacity
member.summary: Gets the degree of opacity of this brush.
member.returns: A value between zero and 1 that indicates the opacity of the brush. This value is a constant multiplier that linearly scales the alpha value of all pixels filled by the brush. The opacity values are clamped in the range 0–1 before they are multiplied together.

member.name: ID2D1Brush.GetTransform
member.summary: Gets the transform applied to this brush.
member.param: The transform applied to this brush.
